title: What is the best type of drone to use for surveillance? - Quora

response.answer_text: A surveillance mission is carefully thought out in advance. Only the tools required for the mission are employed. Drones have hundreds of different variables. As a result, I need to select the droneS that will support the mission.
Something that has a thermal imaging camera would work best for surveillance. Perhaps a DJI Mavic Pro Enterprise Dual or similar.
